Representation Power
Alternatively , we can minimize the reconstruction error in the image space , through the rendering layer with the groundtruth S and m .

our nonlinear texture.from sentence: As in , our nonlinear texture is closer to the groundtruth than the linear model , especially for in - the - wild images ( the first two rows ) .

significantly lower.from sentence: Quantitatively , our nonlinear model has significantly lower L 1 reconstruction error than the lin - We also compare the power of nonlinear and linear 3 DMM in representing real - world 3D scans .

significantly smaller reconstruction err.from sentence: Our nonlinear model has a significantly smaller reconstruction error than the linear model , 0.0196 vs. 0.0241 ( Tab. 3 ) .

low error.from sentence:
Quantitative evaluation of 3D reconstruction .
We obtain a low error that is comparable to optimization - based methods .

3D Face Reconstruction.from sentence:
3D Face Reconstruction .
We achieve on - par results with Garrido et al. , an offline optimization method , while surpassing all other regression methods ] .
